name: Fist vs Guns
description:
Punch away bullets, bosses. Dodge and avoid falling in the spike pits below you.

Gameplay

Bosses will shoot at you. The bullets will knock you back and falling into spikes kill you. You can punch back those bullets to knock the bosses into spikes.

When you punch back a bullet and red particles appear on your wrist, you can shoot your own bullets by pressing a 'Shot-Punch' key.

 Adapt and fight against 7 different types of armed-bosses and defeat as many as you can.

Controls

  • Movement - Arrows, A or S keys.
  • Punch - Z or L keys. 
  • Shot-Punch - X or K keys.
  • Jump - Space key.
